long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage your MVX accounts outside of dapps. Injects the accounts and allows signing transactions for a specific account.

It allows you to -

- Add accounts, storing the account secrets in your extension storage
- Allow application access to the signing capabilities of these accounts (you can accept/reject requests)
- Allows you to sign transactions for MVX networks
- In all of this no secretes leave the extension, only the signature is ever provided
